meaning: When are you going to the movie theater?

word: Bonjour, Omar. Je vais bien, et toi?
meaning: Hello, Omar. I am fine, and you?

word: Oui, c'est intéressant, et toi? Aimes-tu?
meaning: Yes, that's interesting, and you? Do you like it?

word: Oui, j'aime beaucoup. Avec qui es-tu ici?
meaning: Yes, I like it a lot. Who are you here with?

word: Je suis avec ma famille, et toi?
meaning: I am with my family, and you?

word: Moi aussi, je suis avec ma famille.
meaning: Me too, I am with my family.

word: Lily est dans un magasin avec son amie, Zari.
meaning: Lily is in a store with her friend, Zari.

word: La veste est à cent euros.
meaning: The jacket is a hundred euros.

word: Et tu es ma meilleure amie!
meaning: And you are my best friend!

word: Une veste pas chère pour toi?
Bonjour, Léo. Je vais bien, et toi?
meaning: Hello, Léo. I am well, and you?

word: Bien, aussi. Travailles-tu en France maintenant?
meaning: Good, too. Do you work in France now?

word: Oui, j'habite à Paris, et toi?
meaning: Yes, I live in Paris, and you?

word: Non, je suis ici pour un voyage intéressant à deux semaines à Paris.
meaning: No, I am here for an interesting two-week trip to Paris.

word: Oui, et j'aime beaucoup la ville.
meaning: Yes, and I like the city very much.
Do you live with your family?
Yes, I live with my family.

word: Son amie, Lin, est la chauffeur du taxi.
meaning: His friend, Lin, is the taxi driver.

word: Lin! Tu es chauffeur de taxi?
meaning: Lin! Are you a taxi driver?
There it is! (or: Behold!/Here it is!/There you go!)

word: Lin... Ce n'est pas la gare. C'est l'université.
meaning: Lin... It is not the station. It is the university.

word: Lin, ce n'est pas la gare!
Je ne veux pas conduire le taxi.
meaning: I do not want to drive the taxi.

word: Bonjour, je m'appelle Ben. Et toi? Comment tu t'appelles?
meaning: Hello, my name is Ben. And you? What's your name?
My name is Lisa. Where do you live?
Why are you in Spain now?

word: J'étudie l'espagnol. Et toi? Pourquoi es-tu ici?
meaning: I am studying Spanish. And you? Why are you here?

word: J'étudie l'espagnol. J'étudie avec mon frère.
meaning: I study Spanish. I study with my brother.
Do you live in France now?
Yes, I live in France now.
Do you live in the United States now?
Yes, I live in the United States now.
Hello, Alice. Where do you live?

word: Bonjour, Léo. J'habite en France. Et toi?
meaning: Hello, Léo. I live in France. And you?

word: J'habite près d'un parc en ville.
meaning: I live near a park in the city.

word: Ah, c'est bien. Vas-tu souvent au parc?
meaning: Ah, that's good. Do you often go to the park?

word: Oui, j'aime marcher au parc. Et toi? Aimes-tu le parc?
meaning: Yes, I like to walk in the park. And you? Do you like the park?

word: Oui, j'aime beaucoup les arbres et les fleurs.
meaning: Yes, I really like trees and flowers.

word: Du chocolat belge! J'adore le chocolat belge!
meaning: Some Belgian chocolate! I love Belgian chocolate!

word: Non Junior. C'est un journal intime...
Le manger? Non! As-tu faim Junior?
meaning: The food? No! Are you hungry, Junior?

word: La personne qui a écrit ce journal n'est pas très contente.
meaning: The person who wrote this diary is not very happy.

word: Euh.. Non, je ne travaille pas ici.
meaning: Uh... No, I don't work here.
Falstaff, is that your private diary?

word: Non, mais il ya a une fille ici qui aime écrire.
meaning: No, but there is a girl here who likes to write.

word: Maintenant? Non, je ne suis pas contente. Va-t'en.
meaning: Now? No, I am not happy. Go away.
Lily, is this your private diary?

word: Je suis si contente maintenant... Super.
meaning: I am so happy now... Great.
deal (noun, in card games) or gives (verb form of "donner")

word: Bonjour, je m'appelle Marie, je prends souvent le train.
meaning: Hello, my name is Marie, I often take the train.
It is a very interesting trip.

word: J'habite dans une maison près de la gare.
meaning: I live in a house near the station.

word: Parfois je vais avec mes amis.
meaning: Sometimes I go with my friends.

word: Nous aimons beaucoup ces voyages ensemble.
meaning: We really enjoy these trips together.

category: Work Talk - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
meaning: Hi Leo. Where do you live now?

category: Work Talk - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Salut Samia. J'habite aux États-Unis maintenant.
meaning: Hi Samia. I live in the United States now.

category: Work Talk - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
meaning: Ah, interesting. Are you working today?

category: Work Talk - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Non, je ne travaille pas aujourd'hui. Et toi, travailles-tu?
meaning: No, I'm not working today. And you, are you working?

category: Work Talk - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Oui, je travaille dans une boulangerie aujourd'hui.
meaning: Yes, I work in a bakery today.

category: Work Talk - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
meaning: Why do you like working there?

category: Work Talk - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: J'aime travailler là-bas parce que les gens sont gentils.
meaning: I like working there because the people are nice.
Because (Note: "parce" is typically part of the phrase "parce que" meaning "because")
